title: India's Jakson Green nears $476 mln fundraise for renewables capacity expansion
description: India's Jakson Green is nearing a 40 billion-rupee fundraise, aiming to add 1 GW to its renewable energy capacity by early 2026. Partnering with green energy funds, the company plans a 75% debt and 25% equity investment, further enhancing India's clean energy targets.
